rukus.text: 68|1|Nun. Savgand ʙa qalam va on ci menavisand
68|2|Ki tu [ej pajomʙar] ʙa ne'mat [va fazli] Parvardigorat devona nestī
68|3|Va ʙaroi tu podoşe ʙepojon [dar peş] ast
68|4|Va jaqinan tu axloqi ʙisjor naku va voloe dorī
68|5|Pas, ʙa zudī xohī did va onho [niz] xohand did
68|6|ki kadom jak az şumo devona ast
68|7|Parvardigorat ʙehtar medonad, ci kase az rohi Ū gumroh gaşta va [niz] Ū ʙa hidojatjoftagon donotar ast
68|8|Pas az takziʙkunandagon itoat makun
68|9|Onho dūst medorand [va mexohand], ki narmī [va madoro] kunī, to onon [niz] narmī [va madoro] kunand
68|10|Va az har furumojae, ki ʙisjor savgand [-i durūƣ] jod mekunad, itoat makun
68|11|[On ki] Bisjor ajʙçust va ʙa suxancinī omaduşud mekunad
68|12|Va ʙisjor monei kori xajr va mutaçovizu gunahgor ast
68|13|Guzaşta az on, xaşinu ʙetaʙor va ʙadnom ast
68|14|Bad-on xotir, ki sohiʙi molu farzandoni ʙisjor ast
68|15|Hangome ki ojoti Mo ʙar ū xonda şavad, megūjad: «[Inho] Afsonahoi guzaştagon ast»
68|16|Ba zudī ʙar ʙinii ū doƣ [-i nangu rasvoī] menihem
68|17|Mo onhoro ozmoiş kardem, hamon guna ki sohiʙoni ʙoƣro ozmudem, hangome ki savgand jod kardand, ki suʙhgohon [ki mustamandon naʙoşand] mevahoi ʙoƣro ʙicinand
68|18|Va [-le] «inşoalloh» naguftand
68|19|Pas, azoʙe [farogir] az sūji Parvardigorat ʙar [ʙoƣi] onho furud omad, dar hole ki hama dar xoʙ ʙudand
68|20|Pas, on ʙoƣ [-i saʙzu xurram pas az otaşsūzī] hamcun şaʙi sijoh şud
68|21|On goh suʙhgohon jakdigarro nido dodand
68|22|Ki agar mexohed, darav kuned, ʙa sūji kiştzor [va ʙoƣ]-i xeş ʙiraved
68|23|Pas [ʙa sūji kiştzor] harakat kardand, dar hole ki ohista ʙo ham meguftand
68|24|«[Muroqiʙ ʙoşed] Ki imrūz heç [nijozmand va] ʙenavoe dar on [ʙoƣ] vorid naşavad!»
68|25|Va suʙhgohon ʙo tasmimi çiddī ʙar çilavgirī [az vurudi mustamandon ʙa samti ʙoƣ] ʙerun şudand
68|26|Pas, hangome ki on [ʙoƣ]-ro didand, guftand: «Jaqinan mo [iştiʙoh omadaem va] rohro gum kardaem
68|27|ʙalki hama cizro az dast dodaem
68|28|Jake az ʙehtarin [va xiradmandtarin]-i eşon guft: «Ojo ʙa şumo naguftam, caro [şukru] tasʙeh [-i Allohro] namegūed?»
68|29|Guftand: «Parvardigori mo poku munazzah ast. Musallaman, mo sitamgor ʙudem»
68|30|On goh malomatkunon ʙa jakdigar rū ovardand
68|31|[va] Guftand: «Voj ʙar mo, ki tuƣjongar [va sarkaş] ʙudem
68|32|Umedvorem, ki Parvardigoramon [moro ʙiʙaxşad va] dar ivaz cize ʙehtar az on [ʙoƣ] ʙa mo dihad, [caro ki] ʙe gumon, mo ʙa sūi Parvardigori xud rūj ovardaem»
68|33|Azoʙi [Alloh taolo dar dunjo] cunin ast va agar medonistand, azoʙi oxirat musallaman ʙuzurgtar [-u ʙeştar] ast
